label: ham
subject:
[sugar] [PATCH] sugar.presence.presenceservice: don't mix up local
	variable 'activity' and imported module 'activity'
body: 167 (return) [ Ockley (at the end of his second volume) has given an English version of 169 sentences, which he ascribes, with some hesitation, to Ali, the son of Abu Taleb. His preface is colored by the enthusiasm of a translator; yet these sentences delineate a characteristic, though dark, picture of human life.]
